item.title: 消息人士称，威兹航空公司即将达成为新喷气机订购普惠发动机的协议
item.description: 据两位业内消息人士透露，威兹航空公司正逐步与 RTX 旗下的普惠公司达成协议，为其已订购的 177 架空客喷气机购买发动机。【原文：Wizz Air is edging towards a deal with RTX -owned Pratt & Whitney to purchase engines for 177 of its Airbus jets already on order, according to two industry sources.】

item.title: 在 Wojcicki 提出 3.05 亿美元收购要约后，Regeneron 拒绝对 23andMe 提出更高的收购价
item.description: Regeneron Pharmaceuticals 拒绝提交对基因检测公司 23andMe 的新竞标价。 该公司的一位发言人周一告诉路透社，该公司对基因检测公司 23andMe 的出价已超过其最初的中标价格 2.56 亿美元。【原文：Regeneron Pharmaceuticals has declined to submit a new bid for genetic testing company 23andMe exceeding its original winning bid of $256 million, a company spokesperson told Reuters on Monday.】

item.title: 参议院共和党法案将在批准 180 天后终止 7500 美元的电动汽车税收抵免
item.description: 参议院共和党人周一提出了一项税收和预算法案，将在该法案签署成为法律180天后终止对新电动汽车的7500美元税收减免，并将在该法案批准90天后终止对二手电动汽车的4000美元税收减免。【原文：Senate Republicans on Monday proposed a tax and budget bill that would end the $7,500 tax credit on new electric vehicles 180 days after the measure is signed into law, and it would end a $4,000 used-vehicle EV tax credit 90 days after the bill's approval.】

item.title: 特朗普和斯塔默表示美英贸易协议已敲定
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）和英国首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）周一表示，他们已经敲定了两个盟国上个月达成的贸易协议。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump and British Prime Minister Keir Starmer on Monday said they had finalized a trade deal reached between the two allies last month.】

item.title: 交易日 停战希望引发反弹
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 新的全球风险出现，日本央行将考虑放慢债券缩减速度
item.description: 日本央行将在本周二公布的量化紧缩（QT）计划中考虑明年放缓削减债券购买量，因为该行的重点是在经济不确定性不断增加的情况下避免市场出现大的混乱。【原文：The Bank of Japan will consider slowing reductions in its bond purchases next year under a quantitative tightening (QT) plan due on Tuesday, as the bank focuses on avoiding big market disruptions amid growing economic uncertainties.】

item.title: 特朗普称关税必须是任何加拿大协议的一部分，渥太华予以回击
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周一表示，与加拿大达成新的经济协议是可能的，但强调关税必须发挥作用，加拿大政府强烈反对这一立场。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Monday a new economic deal with Canada was possible but stressed tariffs had to play a role, a position that the Canadian government strongly opposes.】

item.title: 可再生能源仍是最便宜的发电设备，而新建天然气发电厂的价格却越来越高
item.description: 拉扎德（Lazard）在周一的一份报告中说，即使没有政府补贴，太阳能和陆上风能等可再生能源也是美国成本最低、部署最快的发电来源。【原文：Renewable power like solar and onshore wind is the least expensive and quickest power generation source to deploy in the United States, even without government subsidies, Lazard said in a report on Monday.】

item.title: 巴西大亨塔努雷邀请罗斯柴尔德公司参与竞购 Braskem 的谈判
item.description: 两位熟悉内情的人士告诉路透社，巴西商人纳尔逊-塔努雷（Nelson Tanure）已聘请咨询公司罗斯柴尔德公司（Rothschild & Co.）进行银行谈判，这对他拟竞购拉丁美洲最大的石化公司巴西石油公司（Braskem）至关重要。【原文：Brazilian businessman Nelson Tanure has retained advisory firm Rothschild & Co. to conduct bank negotiations critical to his proposed bid for Latin America's largest petrochemical firm, Braskem , two people familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，OpenAI 高管曾讨论指控微软的反竞争行为
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周一援引知情人士的话报道，OpenAI 的高管已经讨论过指控该公司的主要支持者微软公司在双方合作期间的反竞争行为。【原文：Executives at OpenAI have discussed accusing the company's major backer, Microsoft , of anticompetitive behavior during their partnership, the Wall Street Journal reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 消息人士称特朗普有望签署公告敲定美英贸易协定
item.description: 三位熟悉内情的消息人士周一表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普预计将在未来几天内签署一份公告，最终确定上个月达成的美英贸易协议的条款。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump is expected to sign a proclamation finalizing the terms of a U.S.-British trade deal agreed last month in coming days, three sources familiar with the matter said on Monday.】

item.title: 据 WWD 报道，CoverGirl 母公司 Coty 正在探索出售事宜
item.description: 据时尚贸易刊物《WWD》周一援引多位业内人士的消息报道，美容公司科蒂（Coty）正在寻找买家，准备分两次抛售。【原文：Beauty company Coty is seeking buyers for a selloff in two parts, fashion trade publication WWD reported on Monday, citing multiple industry sources.】

item.title: 报道称特朗普敦促 EchoStar 和 FCC 主席就许可证达成协议后，EchoStar 暴涨 50
item.description: 据彭博社周五晚些时候报道，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普敦促 EchoStar 公司董事长查理-厄根（Charlie Ergen）和联邦通信委员会主席布兰登-卡尔（Brendan Carr）就该公司无线频谱许可证的命运达成协议，EchoStar 公司股价周一最高上涨了 50%。【原文：Shares of EchoStar rose as much as 50% on Monday following a late Friday Bloomberg report that U.S. President Donald Trump urged EchoStar Chairman Charlie Ergen and Federal Communications Commission Chair Brendan Carr to reach a deal over the fate of the company's wireless spectrum licenses.】

item.title: 美国 CFPB 退出案件后，速汇金与纽约就汇款问题达成和解
item.description: 在美国消费者金融保护局（U.S. Consumer Financial Protection Bureau）退出该民事案件两个月后，速汇金同意支付 25 万美元的罚款，以了结纽约州对其汇款业务的诉讼。【原文：MoneyGram agreed to pay a $250,000 fine to settle a New York state lawsuit over its remittance transfers, two months after the U.S. Consumer Financial Protection Bureau withdrew from the civil case.】

item.title: 消息人士称，三菱商事正在洽谈 80 亿美元的美国页岩油收购案
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的人士周一表示，三菱公司正在洽谈以大约 80 亿美元的价格收购 Aethon Energy Management 公司的美国页岩油生产和管道资产。【原文：Mitsubishi Corp is in talks to acquire the U.S. shale production and pipeline assets of Aethon Energy Management for roughly $8 billion, a person familiar with the matter said on Monday.】

item.title: 文件草案称，七国集团领导人就保护重要矿产供应战略达成一致
item.description: 根据路透社看到的一份声明草案，七国集团领导人周一暂时就一项战略达成一致，以帮助保护关键矿产的供应并促进其经济发展。【原文：Group of Seven leaders on Monday provisionally agreed on a strategy to help protect the supply of critical minerals and bolster their economies, according to a draft statement seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 意大利监管机构对中国 DeepSeek 展开调查
item.description: 意大利反垄断监管机构周一表示，已对中国人工智能初创公司 DeepSeek 展开调查，原因是该公司未能警告用户其可能产生 "不准确、误导性或编造的信息"。【原文：Italy's antitrust regulator said on Monday it had opened an investigation into Chinese artificial intelligence startup DeepSeek for failing to warn users that it may produce "inaccurate, misleading or invented information."】

item.title: 欧盟驳斥准备接受美国统一 10%关税的报道
item.description: 欧盟委员会周一驳斥了有关其愿意接受美国对欧盟商品广泛征收10%关税的报道，称这些报道只是推测，并没有反映目前的讨论情况。【原文：The European Commission dismissed on Monday reports suggesting it was willing to accept a broad U.S. tariff of 10% on EU goods as speculative and said they did not reflect current discussions.】

item.title: 黄金股细节公布后，美国钢铁公司股价上涨
item.description: 美国钢铁公司的股票周一上涨了 5%，因为新日铁对这家美国知名企业 149 亿美元的竞购接近尾声，而且上周末出现了美国政府黄金股份的细节。【原文：Shares of U.S. Steel rose 5% on Monday, as a $14.9-billion bid for the well-known American firm from Nippon Steel approached the finish line and after details of the U.S. government's golden share emerged over the weekend.】

item.title: 洛克希德公司和波音公司在巴黎航展上炫耀 "金顶 "资质
item.description: 洛克希德-马丁公司（Lockheed Martin）和波音公司（Boeing）正在为争夺可能成为全球最大国防合同之一的合同而加紧竞争。【原文：Lockheed Martin and Boeing are positioning themselves as competition intensifies over what could become one of the world's largest defense contracts.】

item.title: 古驰（Gucci）所有者开云集团（Kering）寄希望于危机专家德梅奥（de Meo）引领复兴之路
item.description: 据报道，弗朗索瓦-亨利-皮诺特（Francois-Henri Pinault）决定聘请雷诺老板卢卡-德梅奥（Luca de Meo），这是一个大胆但必要的举措，以应对奢侈品集团开云集团（Kering）销售下滑和债务不断增加的双重挑战。【原文：Francois-Henri Pinault's reported decision to hire Renault boss Luca de Meo is an audacious but necessary move to address the twin challenge of sagging sales and mounting debt at luxury group Kering , investors and industry players say.】

item.title: 联合国海洋大会期间宣布的金融交易
item.description: 上周在法国举行的第三届联合国海洋大会达成了多项金融交易和资金承诺，以帮助保护海洋，尽管资金与每年估计需要的 1,750 亿美元之间仍存在巨大差距。【原文：The third U.N. Ocean Conference in France last week yielded a number of financial deals and money pledges to help protect the seas, although the gap between funding and the estimated annual need of $175 billion remains large.】

item.title: 消息人士称，波音公司高层波普访问印度航空公司总部，讨论坠机事件
item.description: 两名消息人士称，波音民用飞机公司负责人斯蒂芬妮-波普周一在印度会见了印度航空公司董事长，两家公司正努力寻找上周一架波音787梦想飞机致命坠毁的原因。【原文：The head of Boeing Commercial Airplanes, Stephanie Pope, met the chairman of Air India on Monday in India, two sources said, as the companies seek to find the cause of last week's fatal crash involving a Boeing 787 Dreamliner.】

item.title: 投资者希望制定明确的海洋管理规则以扩大融资规模
item.description: 在上周举行的一次会议上，联合国推动投资保护世界海洋的活动达成了约 100 亿美元的交易，但远远低于预计的年度需求，因为许多投资者在投入资金之前都在寻求更明确的海洋管理规定。【原文：A U.N. push for investment to protect the world's oceans yielded around $10 billion in deals at a conference last week, way below the estimated annual need as many investors seek clearer regulation on ocean management before committing funds.】

item.title: 斯塔默表示美英贸易协定 "很快 "将完成
item.description: 英国首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）周一在加拿大与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）会晤前表示，英国和美国应 "很快 "敲定上月达成的贸易协议的实施。【原文：Britain and the United States should finalise "very soon" the implementation of a trade deal agreed last month, Prime Minister Keir Starmer said on Monday ahead of a meeting with U.S. President Donald Trump in Canada.】

item.title: 我们对特朗普组织移动服务的了解
item.description: 特朗普组织周一推出了一款智能手机和自创品牌的移动服务，名为 "特朗普移动"（Trump Mobile），以吸引保守派消费者。【原文：The Trump Organization launched a smartphone and self-branded mobile service on Monday, called Trump Mobile, in a new effort to attract conservative consumers with a wireless service positioned as an alternative to major telecom providers.】

item.title: 普渡制药公司 74 亿美元阿片类药物和解协议赢得美国各州广泛支持
item.description: 普渡制药公司已赢得美国 55 个州和地区总检察长的支持，将以 74 亿美元的和解协议解决数千起针对该制药公司及其所有者萨克勒家族成员的阿片类药物诉讼。【原文：Purdue Pharma has won support from the attorneys general of 55 U.S. states and territories for its $7.4 billion settlement to resolve thousands of opioid lawsuits against the drugmaker and its owners, members of the Sackler family.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴为苹果 MLX 架构推出全新 Qwen3 人工智能模型
item.description: 中国科技巨头阿里巴巴周一在一份声明中说，阿里巴巴为苹果公司的 MLX 架构推出了新的 Qwen3 人工智能模型。【原文：China's tech giant Alibaba has launched new Qwen3 artificial intelligence models for Apple's MLX architecture, Alibaba said in a statement on Monday.】

item.title: 荷兰法院确认苹果滥用约会应用市场支配地位
item.description: 荷兰一家法院周一确认了 2021 年消费者监督机构的一项裁决，即苹果公司滥用其支配地位，对 App Store 中的约会应用程序提供商施加了不公平的条件。【原文：A Dutch court on Monday confirmed a 2021 consumer watchdog 's ruling saying that Apple had abused its dominant position by imposing unfair conditions on providers of dating apps in the App Store.】

item.title: 金霸王就电池寿命索赔起诉 Energizer
item.description: 金霸王（Duracell）起诉威能（Energizer），指控其竞争对手在全国范围的电视和网络广告中误导消费者，宣传谁的碱性电池寿命更长。【原文：Duracell has sued Energizer, accusing its rival of misleading consumers in a nationwide TV and online ad campaign about whose alkaline batteries last longer.】
